en.description: Contamination Casing is a mod that increases Toxin damage and status chance of Arch-guns by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

ru.description: Contamination Casing is a mod that increases Toxin damage and status chance of Arch-guns by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

ko.description: Contamination Casing is a mod that increases Toxin damage and status chance of Arch-guns by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.
